list.name: FPS Motion Cues
list.description: Helps players reduce motion sickness when playing FPS games, inspired by iOS new features "Vehicle Motion Cues"

list.name: EXIF Watermark Generator
list.description: Add a white strip with EXIF data to the photo.

list.name: Scratch Off (Game)
list.description: A 3D scratch card mini-game made with Three.js.

list.name: 14Hz
list.description: A simple web application that allows you to make voice calls to friends through a webpage.

list.name: [Unfinished] A schedule application
list.description: A schedule application designed for students that uses AI technology to recognize class schedules from the school website and import them locally.

list.name: [Unfinished] A player application
list.description: An application for films and TV shows that can scrape online series and movies, written in Flutter, with embedded QuickJS to run JavaScript scripts, providing a convenient watching experience.

list.name: [Unfinished] Flutter QuickJS Library
list.description: A library that runs JavaScript in Flutter using QuickJS.

portfolio.whyisempty: I was busy with work in 2022, A lot has happened, making me lose interest in writing code in my spare time.

list.name: [Unfinished] Pitrah
list.description: A TV browser (WebView wrapper), allow users to scan a QR code to remotely open a webpage that simulates a touchpad for controlling the webpage.

list.name: Pure Schedule / 纯粹课表
list.description: A schedule application developed for a few schools. After maintaining several versions, I went to intern at Xiaomi, and since my work there was also related to scheduling, I stopped updating the app.

list.name: HNIT Schedule / 湖工课程表
list.description: A schedule application developed for HNIT, where I studied in college. This is my first project, written in Android
